help.title: Help Center

audioTutorials.englishDescription: Learn the fundamentals of bookkeeping, including recording transactions, managing accounts, and maintaining financial records.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.subtitle: Welcome to SheBalance
introduction.description: SheBalance na financial management app wey dem design to help people and businesses track sales, manage expenses, monitor inventory, save money, and keep proper financial records. This manual dey provide simple step-by-step guide on how to use the app well well.
introduction.step1: Track sales and revenue with ease
introduction.step4: Create savings plans and monitor progress
introduction.step5: Maintain clean financial records for one place

gettingStarted.title: Create Account & Login
gettingStarted.subtitle: Account Creation & Login
gettingStarted.description: Create your SheBalance account and sign in to access your dashboard.
gettingStarted.step1: To download the SheBalance app for Android, visit www.shebalance.org and click the install prompt when e show
gettingStarted.step2: To download the SheBalance app for iOS, visit www.shebalance.org for safari, click the share button, then the 'Add to Home Screen' button
gettingStarted.step3: Open the app and tap 'Create Account'.
gettingStarted.step4: Fill your details like name, phone number, and password.
gettingStarted.step5: Confirm your account (you fit receive code through email).
gettingStarted.step6: To Login, Enter your phone number/email and password to log in.
gettingStarted.step7: After you don login, dem go direct you to the Dashboard.

dashboard.title: Dashboard Overview
dashboard.subtitle: Understanding the Dashboard
dashboard.description: Your dashboard dey provide snapshot of your financial activities.
dashboard.step1: Total Revenue: Amount wey dem generate from sales
dashboard.step2: Total Sales: Number of sales transactions wey don complete
dashboard.step3: Total Savings: Amount wey you don save for savings plans
dashboard.step4: Low Stock Alert: Products wey dey run low for stock
dashboard.step5: Total Income: All income wey dem record
dashboard.step6: Total Expenses: All expenses wey dem record

inventory.title: Inventory Management
inventory.description1: Manage products and stock levels effectively.
inventory.step1_1: Total Products: Number of products wey dey available
inventory.step1_2: Inventory Value: Total value of all items for stock
inventory.step1_3: Top-Selling Product: The product wey dem sell pass
inventory.step1_4: Low Stock Alert: Alerts when product don dey below e threshold
inventory.description2: Quick quick add products to your inventory.
inventory.step2_2: Enter product name, purchase price, unit price, and quantity

productDetails.title: Product Details
productDetails.subtitle: Managing Product
productDetails.description: View product details and do quick actions.
productDetails.step1: See product name, unit price, quantity, and stock status
productDetails.step2: Edit, Restock, Delete, or Add to Favourites
productDetails.step3: Monitor availability and update stock easy easy

sales.title: Sales Management
sales.description1: Track your sales performance and profit.
sales.step1_1: Total Sales: Total revenue wey dem generate
sales.step1_2: Transactions: Number of sales wey don complete
sales.step1_3: Total Profit: Based on purchase and selling price
sales.step2_4: Choose payment mode: Cash, Transfer, or Credit
sales.description3: Each sale get important details for reference.

finance.title: Finance Management
finance.description1: Track all money wey dey enter and comot for your business.
finance.step1_1: Total Income: All money wey dem receive
finance.step1_2: Total Expenses: All money wey dem spend
finance.step2_5: Filter records by type or date as you need am

savings.title: Savings Management
savings.description1: Set up and track savings towards your goals.
savings.description2: Track progress, contribute, withdraw, or delete plan.
savings.step2_2: Withdraw funds when you need am
savings.step2_3: Filter plans: Just Started, In Progress, Completed, Withdrawn

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage Your Shop & Privacy
settings.description: Update shop information, privacy, and account controls.
settings.step1: Shop Information: Edit shop name, location, and market
settings.step2: Privacy Settings: Choose to make shop details visible or hide am
settings.step3: Danger Zone: Delete shop or delete account permanently (you no fit undo am)

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.subtitle: You don ready to go!
conclusion.description: SheBalance make am simple to manage your sales, expenses, savings, and inventory all for one place. Use this manual as guide to start and maximize the app for better financial management.
conclusion.step1: Keep your records up to date
conclusion.step2: Use the dashboard to make informed decisions
conclusion.step3: Leverage savings plans to reach your goals
